exceptions.tactic: intros plp pl H n H0 H1.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
pl_path_incl_length_def pl_path_nil prec_empty

Premises:
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive pl_path : Set := pl_path_nil : pl_path | pl_path_cons : ad -> pl_path -> pl_path
pl_path_incl_length_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => forall n : nat, pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_0 = fun (_ : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty) (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat) (H0 : pl_path_recon d tl pl_path_nil) (_ : pl_tl_length prec_empty n) => let H2 : d = d -> tl = tl -> pl_path_nil = pl_path_nil -> liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl := match H0 in (pl_path_recon p t p0) return (p = d -> t = tl -> p0 = pl_path_nil -> liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl) with | pl_path_rec_nil d0 => fun (H2 : d0 = d) (H3 : tnil = tl) (H4 : pl_path_nil = pl_path_nil) => (fun H5 : d0 = d => let H6 : d0 = d := H5 in eq_ind_r (fun _ : preDTA => tnil = tl -> pl_path_nil = pl_path_nil -> liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl) (fun H7 : tnil = tl => let H8 : t...
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil
pl_path_incl_ind : forall P : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop, P pl_path_nil prec_empty -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> P plp la -> P (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> P plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> P plp (prec_cons a la ls)) -> forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> P p p0
Inductive pl_path : Set := pl_path_nil : pl_path | pl_path_cons : ad -> pl_path -> pl_path
pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_compat = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl0 = prec_empty /\ pl1 = prec_empty \/ pl0 <> prec_empty /\ pl1 <> prec_empty : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_length = fix pl_path_length (plp : pl_path) : nat := match plp with | pl_path_nil => 0 | pl_path_cons _ p => S (pl_path_length p) end : pl_path -> nat
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec : forall P : pl_path -> Set, P pl_path_nil -> (forall (a : ad) (p : pl_path), P p -> P (pl_path_cons a p)) -> forall p : pl_path, P p
pl_path_rect : forall P : pl_path -> Type, P pl_path_nil -> (forall (a : ad) (p : pl_path), P p -> P (pl_path_cons a p)) -> forall p : pl_path, P p
pl_path_ind : forall P : pl_path -> Prop, P pl_path_nil -> (forall (a : ad) (p : pl_path), P p -> P (pl_path_cons a p)) -> forall p : pl_path, P p
pl_compatible_empt_r : forall p : prec_list, pl_compatible p prec_empty -> p = prec_empty
pl_compatible_empt_l : forall p : prec_list, pl_compatible prec_empty p -> p = prec_empty
liste_rec_length_0 : forall d : preDTA, liste_rec_length_def d prec_empty tnil
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_0 : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d prec_empty tnil
rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil
pl_tl_length_rec_1 : forall d : preDTA, pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d prec_empty tnil
semantic_equiv_1_2 : forall d : preDTA, pre_reconnait d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
Inductive pl_path_recon : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop := pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil | pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
conservation_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (l : term_list), 1 <= essence_list l d prec_empty
sem_listes_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list), liste_reconnait d pl tnil -> pl = prec_empty
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
sem_listes_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), ~ liste_reconnait d prec_empty (tcons hd tl)
non_empty_pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, pl <> prec_empty -> exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl /\ 1 <= pl_path_length p
semantic_equiv_0_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
invar_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
pl_tl_length_rec_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (H : pl_tl_length pl 0) (H0 : liste_reconnait d pl tl) => let H1 : pl = pl -> 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl := match H in (pl_tl_length p n) return (p = pl -> n = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) with | pl_tl_O => fun (H1 : prec_empty = pl) (H2 : 0 = 0) => (fun H3 : prec_empty = pl => let H4 : prec_empty = pl := H3 in eq_ind prec_empty (fun _ : prec_list => 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) (fun _ : 0 = 0 => let H6 : liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl := eq_ind_r (fun pl0 : prec_list => liste_reconnait d pl0 tl) H0 H3 in let H7 : d = d -> prec_empty = prec_empty -> tl = tl -> 0 = lst_length tl...
pl_sum : forall pl : prec_list, pl = prec_empty \/ (exists (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl = prec_cons a la ls)
sem_listes_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d p (tcons hd tl) -> p <> prec_empty
taille_0 = fix taille_0 (l : prec_list) : nat := match l with | prec_cons _ y z => S (taille_0 y + taille_0 z) | prec_empty => 0 end : prec_list -> nat
prec_list_rec : forall P : prec_list -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
pl_compat_check = fix pl_compat_check (p : prec_list) : option nat := match p with | prec_cons _ la (prec_cons _ _ _ as ls) => match pl_compat_check la with | Some n => match pl_compat_check ls with | Some m => if S n =? m then Some m else None | None => None end | None => None end | prec_cons _ la prec_empty => match pl_compat_check la with | Some n => Some (S n) | None => None end | prec_empty => Some 0 end : prec_list -> option nat
essence_list = fun (l : term_list) (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) => match l with | tnil => 1 | tcons _ _ => match pl with | prec_cons _ _ _ => taille_0 pl + S (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d) | prec_empty => 1 end end : term_list -> preDTA -> prec_list -> nat
pl_tl_length_ind : forall P : prec_list -> nat -> Prop, P prec_empty 0 -> (forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> P pl n -> P (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> P la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> P ls (S n) -> P (prec_cons a la ls) (S n)) -> forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> P p n
Inductive pl_tl_length : prec_list -> nat -> Prop := pl_tl_O : pl_tl_length prec_empty 0 | pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n) | pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n) For pl_tl_length: Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope] For pl_tl_S: Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _] For pl_tl_propag: Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope _ _]
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
rec_list_terms = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => (rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k)%bool end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end end end for rec_list_terms : preDTA -> prec_list ->...-> bool Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope]

```  
intros plp pl H n H0 H1.
unfold pl_path_incl_length_def.
intros.
rewrite H in H2.
rewrite H0 in H2.
apply H1.
exact H2.
exact H3.
```

original: intros plp pl H n H0 H1. unfold pl_path_incl_length_def. intros. rewrite H in H2. rewrite H0 in H2. apply H1. apply H2. apply H3.
